newsitem.title: USA: FSA qualifies six muni bond issues for insurance.
newsitem.headline: FSA qualifies six muni bond issues for insurance.

text.p: Financial Security Assurance said that it qualified for bond insurance the following six municipal bond issues scheduled for competitive sale on Thursday.
--Palm Springs, US.D., Calif, General Obligations (GO), $10 million.
--North Linn Community Schools, Iowa, GOs, $3.785 million.
